price: 12. Bafungola ya bomengo ya likolo na ya mabele bizali bia ye, apesaka bozui na oyo alingi mpe akutolaka na oyo alingi. Azali na boyebi ya biloko binso.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lahu maqālīdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru innahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
